Text:
Thanks for XviD! 

(My external player does not support .mkv or .mp4, so I appreciate not having to convert it first.)
well done, GOOD job!!!!!! by not uploading mp4s or mkvs...........thanks!
Ditto the above. XVID works on my X-Box 360 and most others don't. Greatly appreciate the extra time you put in to UP the XVID for us.
thanks ettv!! altho i still have to convert - my TV says it supports Xvid but it lies :(
